description: Number of steps for aliquot sequence for n to converge to 1, or 0 if it never reaches 1.
comments: Length of transient part of trajectory of n if trajectory reaches 1, otherwise a(n) = 0. See A098008 for a better version. See A098007 for further information.
references: R. K. Guy, Unsolved Problems in Number Theory, B6.
R. K. Guy and J. L. Selfridge, Interim report on aliquot series, pp. 557-580 of Proceedings Manitoba Conference on Numerical Mathematics. University of Manitoba, Winnipeg, Oct 1971.
author: Michael Gerenrot (sch116(AT)yahoo.com)
